def_cn: (受法律约束的)协约，契约，合同
def_en: A covenant is a formal written agreement between two or more people or groups of people which is recognized in law.

def_cn: (定期付款的)书面承诺;(尤指向慈善机构定期捐款的)契约
def_en: A covenant is a formal written promise to pay a sum of money each year for a fixed period, especially to a charity.
